special_powers.name: WRATH OF THE LADYBUG
special_powers.description: Modify 4-Starred Ladybug of Doom's attack and damage values by +1 when targeting a character of 100 points or less with an attack.

special_powers.name: EXPANDING BODY
special_powers.description: When Balloon Lizard is targeted by an attack, place a Ballon token on this card. When Balloon Lizard is KO'd deal damage to each adjacent character equal to the number of Balloon tokens on this card.

special_powers.name: BOAR RUSH
special_powers.description: Boar Soldier can use Charge. It can use Charge normally or Boar Soldier can be given a double power action to use Charge and doesn't halve its speed value from it.

special_powers.name: VENOMOUS SPIT
special_powers.description: Give Cobraman Sakuzy a ranged combat action that deals no damage.  Hit characters place a Venom token on their card.  At the beginning of your turn, opposing characters with any Venom tokens are dealt 1 penetrating damage if they haven't already been dealt damage by this effect this turn.  A character with a Venom token may be given a power action to remove all Venom tokens from that character's card.

special_powers.name: EBON SWORD
special_powers.description: Dark Assailant can use Blades/Claws/Fangs. When it does and the result of the d6 is 1, deal it 1 unavoidable damage after actions resolve. If the result of the d6 roll is 6, give the target of the attack an action token after actions resolve.

special_powers.name: RESTART
special_powers.description: When Fiber Jar is KO'd heal all characters 1 click.

special_powers.name: THORNY CONTROL
special_powers.description: Thorn Princess can use Mind Control and Plasticity.  When Thorn Princess uses Mind Control, she can use Improved Targeting: Hindering.

special_powers.name: ELECTRIC SKIN
special_powers.description: When Electric Lizard takes damage from a close combat attack, the attacker is dealt 1 unavoidable damage. This damage isn't an attack.

special_powers.name: THE BELLY OF THE WOLF
special_powers.description: When Forest Wolf KO's an opposing character, place that character on Forest Wolf's card. When Forest Wolf is KO'd during an opponent's turn, place the highest point character on its card into the square Forest Wolf occupied. That character is added to your opponent's force on its last non-KO click, and is then healed of 1 damage.

special_powers.name: SUMMON THE HUNTSMAN
special_powers.description: When Little Red Riding Hood is KO'd by an opposing character, all friendly characters that share a keyword with Little Red Riding Hood modify their attack values by +1 for the rest of the game.

special_powers.name: PROTECT ME!
special_powers.description: Little Red Riding Hood can use Mastermind to transfer damage to characters 75 points or less. If that character is named Forest Hunter, he doesn't have to be adjacent.

special_powers.name: HUNTING THE WOLF
special_powers.description: When Forest Hunter targets a character 100 points or more or with the Animal or Warrior keyword, modify his attack value by +1.

special_powers.name: MAGNET WARRIORS THREE
special_powers.description: When 3 friendly characters with the Magnet Warrior keyword and different names are on the map, damage dealt to Alpha the Magnet Warrior is reduced by 1 in addition to any other effects.

special_powers.name: SHIELD BASH
special_powers.description: Alpha the Magnet Warrior can use Incapacitate. When it does, after actions resolve, it can use Incapacitate again as a free action, but may only target the same character.

special_powers.name: METALLIC BODY
special_powers.description: Alpha the Magnet Warrior can use Combat Reflexes and Toughness.

special_powers.name: MAGNET WARRIORS THREE
special_powers.description: When 3 friendly characters with the Magnet Warrior keyword and different names are on the map, damage dealt to Beta the Magnet Warrior is reduced by 1 in addition to any other effects.

special_powers.name: MAGNETIC PULL
special_powers.description: Beta the Magnet Warrior has a range value of 6.  When it makes a ranged combat attack and hits, place the hit character in a square adjacent to Beta the Magnet Warrior and then it may make a close combat attack targeting that character as a free action.

special_powers.name: MAGNET WARRIORS THREE
special_powers.description: When 3 friendly characters with the Magnet Warrior keyword and different names are on the map, damage dealt to Gamma the Magnet Warrior is reduced by 1 in addition to any other effects.

special_powers.name: METAL FISTS
special_powers.description: Gamma the Magnet Warrior can use Quake and Precision Strike.

special_powers.name: RITUAL
special_powers.description: When Magician of Black Chaos is on your sideline and at least 90 points of friendly characters have been KO'd, you may give any friendly character with the "Yugi Muto" or Dark keyword a free action.  When you do, KO that character and place Magician of Black Chaos on its starting click in a square that character occupied.  A player may only use the Ritual ability once per game.

special_powers.name: CHAOS SCEPTER BLAST
special_powers.description: Magician of Black Chaos can use Energy Explosion and Penetrating/Psychic Blast.  When it does, place a Chaos token on hit characters' cards if they don't have one already.  When a character with a Chaos token makes an attack roll, you may remove the Chaos token to ignore the result and force them to reroll.

special_powers.name: ARCANE ALLIANCE
special_powers.description: Give Dark Magician Girl a free action and choose a friendly character with the Mystical keyword within 8 squares. Choose up to 2 standard powers that character possesses. Dark Magician Girl can use the chosen powers until your next turn.

special_powers.name: TRAP/SPELL
special_powers.description: When this character is KO'd or when building your force by paying the purple point cost, add this dial face down to your Trap/Spell pool. Give a friendly Yu-Gi-Oh! character a power action to set this dial from your pool by choosing "Spell Symbol" or "Trap Symbol" and placing it face down on their card. The set character may use the effects of that Trap/Spell.

special_powers.name: SPELL: MYSTICAL SPACE TYPHOON
special_powers.description: Give the set character a power action and choose an adjacent opposing character. Remove any tokens or set traps/spells from that character's card, that character drops any held objects or assigned Relics, and that character ignores any Resource assigned to it. When that character hits an opposing character with a close combat attack, remove the spell.

special_powers.name: TRAP: MIRROR WALL
special_powers.description: When the set character takes damage from an opponent's attack and isn't KO'd, after actions resolve you may activate this trap. Choose an opposing character that dealt damage to this character this turn. The set character's combat values are replaced with all of the chosen character's combat values and may use any standard power the chosen character can use. When the set character is healed or takes damage, remove the trap.

special_powers.name: FUSION
special_powers.description: When a listed character is adjacent to all other listed characters and hits an opposing character, after actions resolve it may be given a free action to replace these characters with Blue-Eyes Ultimate Dragon from your sideline.  When Blue-Eyes Ultimate Dragon enters the game in this way, it starts the same number of clics from its starting line as the character given the action and modifies its combat values by +1.  This trait is active even when this character isn't on the map. Blue-Eyes White Dragon Blue-Eyes White Dragon Blue-Eyes White Dragon

special_powers.name: NEUTRON BLAST ATTACK
special_powers.description: Blue-Eyes Ultimate Dragon can use Energy Explosion. When it does, the area of effect includes all untargeted characters within 3 squares and line of fire of one or more hit targets assigned at least 1 damage.

special_powers.name: FUSION
special_powers.description: When a listed character is adjacent to all other listed characters and hits an opposing character, after actions resolve it may be given a free action to replace these characters with Valkyrion the Magna Warrior from your sideline. When Valkyrion the Magna Warrior enters the game in this way, it starts the same number of clicks from its starting line as the character given the action and modifies its combat values by +1. This trait is active even when this character isn't on the map. Alpha the Magnet Warrior Beta the Magnet Warrior Gamma the Magnet Warrior

special_powers.name: MAGNETIC WARRIORS
special_powers.description: If Valkyrion the Magna Warrior is on the map as a result of using the Fusion ability, penetrating damage dealt to it can be reduced.

special_powers.name: MAGNET SWORD
special_powers.description: Valkyrion the Magna Warrior can use Precision Strike. When Valkyrion the Magna Warrior hits with a close combat attack, after actions resolve, it may use Pulse Wave as if it had a range value of 6 as a free action.

special_powers.name: TRAP NEGATION
special_powers.description: Facedown traps on set opposing characters can't be activated.

special_powers.name: CYBER ENERGY SHOCK
special_powers.description: Jinzo can use Pulse Wave. When he does, hit characters with no action tokens are given an action token.

special_powers.name: TITANIUM ARMOR
special_powers.description: Jinzo can use Energy Shield/Deflection and Invulnerability.

special_powers.name: Open Air
special_powers.description: Orange squares are Open Air squares. After actions resolve, if a character who can't use the Flight ability occupies an Open Aiir square, deal them 1 unavoidable damage, then that character's owner places them in their starting area. Non-held objects in Open Air squares are removed from the map.
